description: This file defines the immutable `ChatMessage` class, which models a chat message with fields: id, userId, message, and timestamp. It includes methods for serialization (`toJson`) and deserialization (`fromJson`).

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: An immutable model class representing a chat message with serialization support.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a `ChatMessage` instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts a `ChatMessage` instance to a JSON map.
